org.flowforwarding.of.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.flowforwarding.of.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class Controller
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    Class Controller
    Author:
    Infoblox Inc. Handles incoming tcp connections. Launches and dispatches Switch nurses which are handling connections with switches
